-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A binding for libktx from Khronos
--   
--   Allows ktx format textures to be loaded into an OpenGL context. libktx
--   is included as a submodule and compiled with 'c-sources'.
@package ktx
@version 0.2

module Graphics.Rendering.KTX
type ErrorCode = Word32
data Dimensions
Dimensions :: GLsizei -> GLsizei -> GLsizei -> Dimensions
initContext :: IO ()
loadTextureN :: FilePath -> IO TextureObject
loadTextureM :: ByteString -> IO TextureObject
instance Typeable GLEWException
instance Typeable KTXException
instance Eq GLEWException
instance Ord GLEWException
instance Show GLEWException
instance Eq KTXException
instance Ord KTXException
instance Show KTXException
instance Exception KTXException
instance Exception GLEWException
